title: Hug me
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow, Bosustow Entertainment and Churchill Films
brief_description: An animated story of a lonely porcupine who wants a friend to hug him more than anything else in the world, but who is shunned by the other animals. He eventually finds such a friend in the forest. Based on the book “Hug me” by Patti Stren.
creator_credit_for_label: Sam Weiss, Nick Bosustow, Bosustow Entertainment and Churchill Films
